DOC.brief_title: Ventilation Strategies , Anesthetic Techniques Cerebral Oxygenation Beach Chair Position
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective cohort study randomize nested design . Patients present shoulder surgery randomize receive desflurane total intravenous anesthesia propofol . Regional cerebral oxygenation measure use INVOS 5100C monitor ( Covidien , Boulder , CO ) . Depth anesthesia maintain within Bispectral Index range 40-60 . Following positioning , inspire oxygen fraction minute ventilation sequentially adjust . At set point , regional cerebral oxygenation record venous blood gas analysis perform . Statistical analysis repeat measure analysis variance ventilation strategy within-subjects factor anesthetic technique between-subjects factor ; post hoc Tukey 's correction use multiple comparison . If simple maneuver ventilation anesthetic technique prevent low brain oxygen level , patient outcome may improve .
